GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
bpf, verifier: Fix memory leak in array reallocation for stack state

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 06615967d4889b08b19ff3dda96e8b131282f73d, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit c69431aab67a912836e5831f03d99a819c14c9c3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bpf, verifier: Fix memory leak in array reallocation for stack state
